title: Tether Leads $8M Strategic Investment in Speed to Advance Lightning-Native, Stablecoin-Powered Payments
content: Tether, the largest company in the digital assets industry, announced today that it has made a strategic investment in Speed1, Inc. (“Speed”), a payments infrastructure company building instant, global settlement rails using the Bitcoin Lightning Network and stablecoins. Tether led the company’s $8 million funding round together with ego death capital. […]

title: Tether Submits Proposal to Acquire Juventus Football Club
content: Tether has submitted a binding all cash proposal to Exor to acquire its entire stake in Juventus Football Club.
